com.soa.process
Interface ProcessVariable

public interface ProcessVariable

Represents a variable defined in a micro-orchestration process.

Method Detail

getName

java.lang.String getName()
Returns the name of the variable.

Returns:
Name of the variable.

getType

java.lang.String getType()
Returns the type of the variable.

Returns:
Type of the variable.

getDefaultValueAsString

java.lang.String getDefaultValueAsString()
Returns the default value defined for the variable in a string format.

Returns:
String representation of the variable's default value, null if none provided.

getDefaultValue

java.lang.Object getDefaultValue()
Returns the default value defined for the variable. It will be an Object of a class that corresponds to its type.

Returns:
Object default value of the variable, null if none provided.
